title: To fix ‘spiritual malaise’ behind addiction, Kennedy announces  efforts on homelessness and recovery
description: Trump administration details a new addiction initiative led by HHS secretary Kennedy emphasizing faith-based groups, tough love, and recovery.
content: Trump administration details a new addiction initiative led by HHS secretary Kennedy emphasizing faith-based groups, tough love, and recovery.
